description: Ensure errors are identified, described, and prevented where required.
recommendation: Provide error descriptions, correction suggestions, confirmation steps, and status announcements. (WCAG 2.1 SC 3.3.1,3.3.3,3.3.4,4.1.3)
algorithm: Flags aria-invalid fields without aria-errormessage/aria-describedby, pattern inputs without guidance, destructive forms lacking confirmation controls, and status-like messages without role/aria-live.
algorithm_advanced: Checks aria-invalid fields missing aria-errormessage/aria-describedby, pattern inputs missing title/aria-describedby, destructive forms without confirmation inputs, and class-based status messages missing role/aria-live.
